name: Icy Trio Remix
description:
Icy Trio by Yami Vapor is the third flavor introduced into the Yami Vapor E-Juice line, following the bestseller, Taruto. Icy Trio presents a refreshing "trio" of strawberry, kiwi, and lychee with a sweet and cool menthol.

This is my fifth revision of icy trio and it’s getting closer. Please feel free to feedback me, I’d love your input! This is a work in progress.
author: Borninfire138

reviews.text: You can put this on the shelves and it will beat the sales of many many store bought eliquids. This recipe is very well balanced and the kiwi-lychee combo with the underlying (FW) Strawberry are in perfect harmony. Thank you for sharing, it's amazingly good and full of flavour at only 7.05%. Improving will be very very hard to do, maybe the fift revision is the one, no?  Congratz Borninfire138
